# mixGroupName

**Instance Property**

An arbitrary name that assigns an audio resource to an audio mix group.

## Declaration

```swift
var mixGroupName: String?
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioMixGroup] and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioMixGroupsComponent] for more information.
